This course not very well organised and the content of everyday meeting appears to be spontaneous. And sometimes the instructor does not seem to care whether the whole class has fully understood what was going on before moving on to the next topic.

Strengths - flexible, structured, paced according to the needs of the students.
Weaknesses - In my opinion, we could have spent less time on the cultural component of the course since that would have given us more time to practise the language.
Yes, I would recommend this course to someone who just wants to learn a new language without having any specified target or goal in mind such as taking it for being able to read primary sources etc.
